resources.string: If you feel sick with any of the symptoms of covid-19, please call YAQADA or the emergency immediately for help.
See how can you protect yourself and your family from covid-19
Wear the protective mask before going out
Wash your hands frequently for at least 20 seconds
Avoid close contacts\n\n Avoid unnecessary collective gatherings
Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth
Clean surfaces using soap and water, then use disinfectant.
Try to stay at home and don\'t go out unless it\'s necessary
Call 0801004747, 141 or 300, in case of fever, cough and breathing difficulty
